name: The Pale King's Circlet
data: It increases the users dexterity nicely.
It increases the users intelligence nicely.
It decreases the users charisma adequately.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (poor in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration an average amount.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'anatomy'.
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'leadership'.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance somewhat.
The circlet contains an aspect of Hastur's immeasurable genius.
